Class BookingService

java.lang.Object
com.javaoop.movie_booking_app.service.BookingService
@Service public class BookingService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing movie ticket bookings. Provides methods to create, cancel, update booking status, and query bookings.

    • BookingService

      public BookingService(BookingRepository bookingRepository, MemberRepository memberRepository, ShowtimeRepository showtimeRepository, SeatRepository seatRepository)
      Constructs a BookingService with required repositories.
      Parameters:
      bookingRepository - the booking repository
      memberRepository - the member repository
      showtimeRepository - the showtime repository
      seatRepository - the seat repository

  • Method Details

    • createBooking

      @Transactional public void createBooking(BookingFormDto request, Long memberId, Long showtimeId) throws SeatUnavailableException, jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException, IllegalStateException
      Creates a new booking for a given member and showtime based on the booking request. Performs seat availability check, member existence and age verification, and seat validity.
      Parameters:
      request - the booking form DTO containing seat IDs and booking type
      memberId - the ID of the member making the booking
      showtimeId - the ID of the showtime to book
      Throws:
      SeatUnavailableException - if any requested seat is already booked
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if member, showtime, or requested seats do not exist
      IllegalStateException - if the member does not meet the age requirement for the movie rating

    • cancelBooking

      @Transactional public void cancelBooking(Long bookingId, Long memberId)
      Cancels an existing booking for a member if allowed. Validates booking ownership, current booking status, and time constraints before cancellation.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the ID of the booking to cancel
      memberId - the ID of the member requesting cancellation
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if the booking is not found
      IllegalStateException - if the booking does not belong to the member, if the booking status is not PENDING, or if cancellation is attempted less than 30 minutes before showtime

    • updateBookingStatus

      @Transactional public void updateBookingStatus(Long bookingId, BookingStatus status)
      Updates the status of an existing booking.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the ID of the booking to update
      status - the new status to set
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the booking is not found

    • findBookingsForMember

      public List<Booking> findBookingsForMember(Member member)
      Retrieves all bookings associated with a specific member, ordered by showtime start time descending.
      Parameters:
      member - the member whose bookings to retrieve
      Returns:
      list of bookings for the given member

    • findBookingsForShowtime

      public List<Booking> findBookingsForShowtime(Showtime showtime)
      Retrieves all bookings for a specific showtime, ordered by showtime start time descending.
      Parameters:
      showtime - the showtime whose bookings to retrieve
      Returns:
      list of bookings for the given showtime

    • findAllBookings

      public List<Booking> findAllBookings()
      Retrieves all bookings in the system.
      Returns:
      list of all bookings
